name: Kristin Ess Deep Clean Clarifying Shampoo for Oily Hair & Build Up | Detox Purifying + Cleansing Oily Hair Treatment - Sulfate Free + Vegan - Product for Thick, Curly + Color Treated Hair
short_description: “Sometimes you just need a fresh start. This clarifying shampoo removes mineral deposits, product buildup, excess oils, and even silicones that can build up over time. Use this when needed to get a deeper clean.” - Kristin Ess
Cleanse + Condition: A clean, well-conditioned canvas is essential. These universal products cleanse + deeply condition to leave hair feeling moisturized, full and looking shiny from root to tip.
For all hair types, Buildup removing, Purifying + volumizing, Shine enhancing, Mineral detoxifying, Super sudsing

How To: Depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount of shampoo into your palm. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the scalp to create a rich lather. Add more shampoo if desired. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary.
Cruelty free + vegan, free of parabens, phthalates + silicones
product_description: Contains Zip-Up Technology, our proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

name: Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Shampoo, Plant-Based – Clarifies, Removes Residue and Nourishes for Shiny, Healthy Hair – For Dull Hair - Apple Cider Vinegar, Aloe Leaf Juice – 24 Fl Oz
short_description: Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Clarify and Shine Plant-Based* Shampoo gently removes residue and impurities while nourishing the scalp, revealing healthy, shiny hair without over-drying, leaving it smooth, revitalized, and naturally vibrant.

Our Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Clarify and Shine Shampoo contains concentrated Apple Cider Vinegar and Aloe. The clarifying formula removes residue, nourishes the scalp, and smooths hair, leaving it shiny, revitalized, and healthy-looking.

Apply shampoo to wet hair, lather, and rinse. Follow with Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar Scalp Serum 2-3 times a week to remove build up, impurities and moisturize the scalp. Then follow with Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Conditioner for best results. Conserve water when possible.

Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Clarify and Shine Shampoo is made with *95% plant-based and naturally derived ingredients and is also free from Sulfates, Parabens, Dyes, Gluten, Phthalates & Propylene Glycol. Our biodegradable formulas are pH balanced and Animal Test Free (PETA).

At Renpure, we believe that everyone deserves beautiful hair, without compromise. Our pump and bottle are both 100% recyclable, making sustainable choices easier. After rinsing, drop the whole package into the recycling bin.
product_description: Renpure Apple Cider Vinegar & Aloe Clarify and Shine Plant-Based Shampoo gently removes residue while infusing hair with nourishing hydration, leaving it smooth, shiny, and healthy-looking. Our naturally derived formula brings your hair to life without the use of harmful ingredients, all while caring for our planet.
product_details: Material free ‎Dye Free, Paraben Free, Phthalate Free, Sulfate Free

name: Nexxus Clean and Pure Clarifying Shampoo, With ProteinFusion, Nourished Hair Care Silicone, Dye And Paraben Free 33.8 oz
short_description: CLARIFYING SHAMPOO: This lightweight, clarifying shampoo gently cleanses, leaving hair nourished and purified
DRY HAIR SHAMPOO: From the Clean & Pure hair care system, this hydrating shampoo has an exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals for smooth and nourished hair
POWERFUL PROTEIN INFUSION: Visibly heal signs of hair damage. Nexxus H4 Complex restores the four signs of hair health: strength, elasticity, shine and moisture. Bring the salon experience home
SHAMPOO HAIR DETOX: Made with no silicones, dyes and parabens, this shampoo is safe for even dull, dry or damaged hair
HYDRATING SHAMPOO: Born in salons and perfected by science, each Nexxus hair care system is crafted with proteins extracted from nature’s most precious ingredients to nourish hair
product_description: Want a shampoo that leaves hair deeply nourished, soft, smooth and strong? Discover Nexxus Clean & Pure Shampoo. It cleanses and detoxifies hair while replenishing vital nutrients. Nexxus Clean & Pure hair products are packed with powerful ingredients to purify and revive your hair. Formulated to be silicone, dye and paraben free, this hydrating shampoo is gentle and safe to use every day. Salon-crafted with the exclusive ProteinFusion blend of elastin protein and marine minerals, this hair shampoo provides a deep clean while locking in moisture. Great for all hair types, you can unleash your hair’s natural smoothness all day long. Repairing hair is a multi-step process that includes a combination of hair products. This clarifying shampoo goes well with Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox Conditioner, Nexxus Clean & Pure Invigorating Detox Scalp Scrub, and Nexxus Clean & Pure Nourishing Detox 5in1 Invisible Hair Oil. For a deep detox, start your hair care routine with Clean & Pure Scalp Scrub to help remove impurities including product and oil build-up. Next, cleanse with Clean & Pure Shampoo. Last, smooth Nexxus Clean & Pure Conditioner onto wet hair and wait three minutes before rinsing thoroughly. Trust your beautiful, healthy hair to the power of Nexxus.

name: Oily Scalp Shampoo & Conditioner Set – Purifying Clarifying Hair Care with Salicylic Acid, Peppermint Oil & Houttuynia Extract – Refresh, Balance & Control Oil – Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, 16 fl oz
short_description: Purify & Balance Oily Scalp – Deep-cleaning, Clarifying shampoo and conditioner set with Salicylic Acid to gently exfoliate scalp buildup, reduce excess oil, and maintain a refreshed, balanced scalp environment.

Refreshing Peppermint & Botanical Extracts – Infused with Peppermint Oil, Papaya, Rosemary, Sage, Basil, and Oat Extracts that cool, soothe, and energize your scalp while leaving hair soft, silky, and manageable.

Strengthen & Nourish from Root to Tip – With Biotin, Argan Oil, Linseed Extract, and Yeast Ferment, this duo strengthens hair follicles, supports thicker-looking hair, and restores lightweight volume without greasiness.

Korean Haircare Inspired Formula – Combines Houttuynia Cordata & Camellia Japonica Extracts, time-honored ingredients in Korean haircare, to detoxify the scalp, soothe irritation, and support long-term scalp health.

Safe & Effective for All Hair Types – Gentle daily formula free from harsh sulfates, parabens, and silicones. Ideal for men and women with oily, fine, or combination hair seeking a natural scalp reset and long-lasting freshness.
product_description: Purify · Balance · Refresh Give your scalp the reset it deserves with our Oily Scalp Shampoo & Conditioner Set. Specially formulated with Salicylic Acid to gently exfoliate buildup and reduce excess oil, this clarifying and refreshing duo restores balance to your scalp without stripping away essential moisture. Infused with Peppermint Oil, it delivers a cooling sensation that invigorates and soothes, while Houttuynia Cordata, Camellia Japonica, and Papaya Extracts help purify, detoxify, and support scalp health. Biotin, Argan Oil, Linseed, and Oat Extracts deeply nourish and strengthen from root to tip, leaving your hair soft, lightweight, and full of natural shine. Inspired by Korean haircare traditions, this gentle formula is sulfate-free and paraben-free, making it safe for daily use on all hair types, including color-treated hair. Say goodbye to greasy roots and hello to a scalp that feels clean, balanced, and refreshed.

name: Dove Density Boost Clarifying Shampoo Scalp + Hair Therapy for Gentle Cleansing, with Vitamin B3, Zinc and 0% sulfates, 9.25 oz
short_description: ZERO PERCENT SULFATES FORMULA: Dove Clarifying Shampoo for Scalp + Hair Therapy contains ingredients that nourish your scalp with Vitamin B3, Zinc, and 0% sulfates to treat scalp build-up and deep cleaning hair.

GOOD-BYE TO OIL EXCESS: Our shampoo with zinc revives fine hair without stripping and dissolves excess oils from the scalp to accomplish the Density Boost we are looking for. Ready for a moment of mindfulness as you clarify and cleanse hair?
A GENTLE CLEANSING: 90% of women experienced gentle cleansing and a refreshed, balanced scalp after a salon study with 40 women applied our hair clarifying shampoo with thin and fine hair in 2023.
VISIBLY THICKER, STRONGER, FULLER HAIR: This purifying shampoo for oily hair nurtures your roots and strengthens fibers for long-term hair strength and density.
FORMULATED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS: Our shampoo to remove build-up leverages over 60 years of skincare expertise. Have you seen the full list of Dove products in our Density Boost regime?
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Dove believes Real Beauty is cruelty-free. Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is proud to be PETA-Approved Vegan. Including our gentle clarifying shampoo for fine hair.
product_description: Experience a revolutionary hair care journey with Dove Clarifying Shampoo for Scalp + Hair Therapy, boasting a cutting-edge 0% sulfates formula meticulously developed to nourish your scalp with Vitamin B3 and Zinc. This exceptional shampoo goes beyond the ordinary, bidding farewell to excess oils without compromising on gentleness, accomplishing the coveted Density Boost for fine hair. In a recent salon study involving 40 women with thin and fine hair in 2023, an impressive 90% reported experiencing gentle cleansing and a refreshed, balanced scalp. The Dove Scalp + Hair Therapy Density Boost regimen, formulated in collaboration with dermatologists harnessing over 60 years of skincare expertise, actively nurtures roots and strengthens hair fibers. The result is visibly thicker, stronger, and fuller hair, promising long-term benefits. Dove's commitment to Real Beauty is embodied in the thoughtfully made Clarifying Shampoo. Globally adhering to cruelty-free practices, Dove proudly holds PETA-approved vegan certification, ensuring that your beauty regimen aligns with ethical values. Dive into the extensive Dove Density Boost regime and discover a range of products designed to elevate your hair care experience. Embrace a holistic approach to beauty that not only enhances your natural radiance but also reflects a commitment to cruelty-free and ethical practices. With Dove, your hair care becomes a celebration of Real Beauty, where every strand tells a story of nourishment, strength, and ethical consciousness.

name: GIOVANNI ECO CHIC 50:50 Balanced Hydrating Clarifying Shampoo - Leaves Hair pH Balanced for Over-Processed Hair, Provides Moisture & Protection, Salon Quality, No Parabens, Color Safe - 8.5 oz
short_description: MOISTURIZING CLEANSER - Our hydrating shampoo infuses each strand of hair with a proprietary blend of vitamins, nutrients, and proteins to increase strength and vitality. Perfect for daily use in normal to dry hair types
COLOR SAFE, DAMAGE CARE - Designed to protect over-worked, over-processed and color-treated hair while locking in color and shine. Your hair will be hydrated, moisturized and perfectly pH balanced

EVERYDAY PH CONTROL - With Aloe Vera, Rosemary, and other Botanical Extracts contained in its formula, GIOVANNI 50:50 Balanced Hydrating-Clarifying Shampoo adds moisture and manageability to your hair while remaining gentle enough for everyday use

VEGAN-FRIENDLY & CRUELTY-FREE - GIOVANNI products use a number of organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified cruelty free. GIOVANNI products are never tested on animals and come in sophisticated recyclable packaging
ECO CHIC - GIOVANNI has been bridging the gap between natural and salon-quality hair care since 1979. We strive to use the very best ingredients and are always focused on high performance
product_description: GIOVANNI Eco Chic 50:50 Balanced Hydrating-Clarifying Shampoo infuses each strand of hair with a proprietary blend of vitamins, nutrients, and proteins in order to increase strength and vitality. This daily use shampoo is for normal to dry hair types. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.
